name: Heretics Sweatshirt
description: Stay warm and show your team spirit with this Heretics sweatshirt. Made from a soft and cozy cotton blend, this sweatshirt will keep you comfortable all day long. The classic fit and ribbed cuffs and hem provide a timeless look, while the embroidered Heretics logo and team colors on the chest add a touch of team pride. Whether you're cheering on the team at the game or just lounging at home, the Heretics sweatshirt is the perfect choice. Show it off at Th3 Heretics Hub!
